post.body: I have both versions of OmniGraffle and I seriously cannot tell the difference between the two.
I made it as far as 8. Please, be a better man than I am:)
Well, it's great that you only got kids out of kissing people. I got herpes. No, wait!
I've always felt awkward watching something that has bewbs with the folks. How does that work for you?
On the dieting front today: Black Angus Burger, Fish and Chips, 2 cans of Coke, a Milk Shake and 2 iced teas. In a span of two meals :(
Shopping Aftermath: Instead of getting christmas gifts, I got...a lightsaber. Fail.
I saw new camouflage-patterned Pumas in my room and almost forgot that I bought them yesterday. Well, new shoes should be enough motivat ...
Loved the shit out of the latest House Episode. Primarily because of 13 exposing her hips which I found oddly sexayy
Final Game-related comment of the night: Left 4 Dead left me...underwhelmed #xbox360
And this is me getting carried away by the beauty of EndWar: Unit 5 Attack Hostile 5 and secure point Zulu. Awesome. http://bit.ly/KZns
Finally got myself a copy of EndWar. I'm amazed that the most efficient Speech recognition system for me comes with an Xbox 360 game
Nomming on Thai chicken on Red Curry Rice. Rico's Green Curry variant looks like vomit sry to say
Finally uTorrent for OS X! http://ping.fm/lFyJj
Well I am of the sentiment that the home phone has been reduced to a collection basin for telemarketing and collection calls @cxi
Key Insight on Marketing Profs' "Twitter Like You Mean It" http://bit.ly/P6ds is "ambient awareness" Great work on this one @marketingprofs
Ah fuck it. Dear DART, how about I give you the finger, sleep like right now and be on time for work for once? #AffiliateMarketing
Wondering how merchants will fare on Black Friday/Cyber Monday given the current economic crunch. #AffiliateMarketing
More DART rants: You mean I have to border=0 your shit for images? Who the hell wants a blue border on linked images anyway? #AffiliateM ...
DART for Publishers is probably the most awkward, clunkiest product DoubleClick.net has to offer. It only works on IE ferchrissakes
Cramming for my girlfriend's birthday dinner tomorrow. Thinking of dining at Heat http://ping.fm/fgbEW Any feedback on this place? Ambie ...
So my uncle (@pimplepopper 's dad) added me on Facebook. He cites "IF IT IS TO BE IT IS UP TO ME" as his favorite quote. WTH said that?
Listening to @jozzua's webinar on Web Marketing. My thoughts? The moderator girl sounds HOT!
RT @MarketingProfs: Cool.. actor @john_lithgow is on Twitter, talking about his latest play. (Thanks @harperstudio)
Well I still don't understand why Bethesda was entrusted with a Fallout sequel. @cxi and @sh3lly85. Think Oblivion. feh.
A Seth Godin Apprenticeship! I want it! http://ping.fm/MPQX5
Not to be oneupped with gadgets, my dad just bought a new phone. What a douche
No, ipod/iTunes "Genius" Andrew E. is not "Similar" to Cartel.
You know what else adds 10lbs besides a TV Camera? That's right, food. And the Holiday season.
It took 10 episodes, but Fringe's plot is finally steering itself to "Doesn't Suck Blvd."
Besides Kompozer, anyone else know of a free HTML editor for OSX?
You know what else causes migraine? Watching a movie on your laptop in a moving vehicle!
I just realized I've beaten all my xbox360 games, anyone have any nice game recos?
Dear Hindsight, Fuck you.
There is absolutely no shame in eating your own words in relation to a business decision you made half a year ago is there?
After almost a month of not writing, I finally got to finish a blog entry: http://ping.fm/tVKgv
Windows mobile has got to be the worst platform iv ever had the misfortune of using
Eight-person Mancomm Meeting. One of them has really bad cold.
1/4 Tablet of Xanax + Anti-Depressant + Cold Medication = FEELING OF INVINCIBILITY! WHO WANTS FISTICUFFS?! WHO?!
Listening to Thursday's Five Stories Falling EP and Geoff explained what 'Standing on the Edge of Summer' was about, I was like...:(
When WebMD.com tells you that your hands are shaking because you might have Parkinson's it's time to panic with your cyberchondria hat
Blue Screen of Death on my XP Parallels VM. Windows is hopeless. Feh.
The boost app for the iPhone/ipodtouch wouldve been a great distraction...if it wasn't helps buggy that is.
Despite what your friends tell you, you CAN catch a cold by kissing someone who has it. In rare instances, you can also get pregnant.
Switched to @bgardner 's Revoltion Code Blue WP theme. Great work on this man.
C5, C5, C5, why do I even bother taking chances with you
Also, the iPhone and iPod touch's text entry system wasn't made for fat people with fat fingers. You bestv breliedve yo
Screw you iWork! I shall, again leave you and make sweet love to ms office! You had your chance. Bitch.
12seconds - You are Adopted! http://tiny12.tv/SPFTR
Setting up a merchant program over at Shareasale.com. It looks like I don't even need to meet with a tech rep. Which is cool.
And I shall now fall sleep while listening to Harvard Business IdeaCast.
Mafia 2 due next year! http://ping.fm/2P5ed Why don't I know of this? WHY?!
I've been meaning to ask this question for quite some time now: When you poop and use TP, do you chuck it in the bowl or the trashcan?
http://tinyurl.com/6c8cgd Listening to SDRE's The Rising Tide album and I'm..wowsomed.
The sportacular iphone app is eating up way too much of my time
(music) Queued for download: Sunny Day Real Estate and Failure Discographies
12seconds - Misery Business http://tiny12.tv/46IK8
I love how she's full of energy @JiMpiSh. Sometimes though, I wish she'd stop smiling so much
Also, I just realized-- What the fuck's up with my obsession with Paramore?
Watching Paramore's the Final Riot concert DVD. Hayley looks sexier than usual.
Dear christmas shopping mob, thank you for clogging up every major road in the metro, you make life so stress-free!
Had a nice Japanese dinner with the ladyfriend. Kani salad SHOULD be banned. Shit's addictive yo
It's sad that I can relate to the Leonard Character in Big Bang theory and how Sheldon reminds me of @marco_palinar
I am going to avoid talking to my mom until all this looney talk about creating a facebook account for her blows over. Whatta crazy.
Also, I'm done with The Big Bang Theory Season 1. Now, it's time to rape my bandwidth by DL'ing eleven season 2 eps.
Got a copy of 1password and headline free from Macheist! a $60 value! http://givingtree.macheist.com/
Also, in exchange for the flashlight I gave @pimplepopper, I got a notepad and a quill! Guess who got the better end of THAT bargain. ME.
NOT disappointed that @pimplepopper 's family didn't give me Gillette products--Instead, his sister gave me...DRUGS! Sweet!
And just as I thought the holiday alcohol binge is over, I am again, getting drunk. Intervention anyone?
You know what would be awesome for my condo? Why a Periodic Table of Elements shower curtain of course! http://bit.ly/WtPj
Watching 'The Departed' after a long tiring day. Tomorrow, I will *try* to get myself in the right mindset for work.
Also, Canned laughter died with FRIENDS. Why the hell are TV shows still using them?
From Seth Godin's blog: http://bit.ly/128g3 Something I *do* know but, sadly, also something I'm guilty a lot of.
This week's loot: Gladwell's Outliers, Obama's Audacity of Hope, Galactic's C2B album AND...Justin Timberlake's Recrimination. Shut up.
Well I guess I'm going to eastwood for dinner. Now, If I could only get myself to take a shower...
cause a bottle of vodka's still lodged in my head and some blonde gave me nightmares...yeup. Goodmorning hangover.
If the videoke machines round here have last.fm installed, I'm pretty sure 6cyclemind would rule the charts
Hoping that, later, skype won't be as congested as globe ph,when it's time to call for xmas greetings.
Wait, how does this work? Do I keep microblogging until I get wasted? I don't remember doing this last christmas! Fucking twitter. Fucki ...
I love how Christmas is the only day my dad allows me to smoke in front of him. So yeah, dad, merry christmas. Here's some Second hand s ...
And, let's start with the Hennessy. ALWAYS start with the Hennessy.
